data.title: Biography of Frederick II King Denmark 1534-1588
meta_keywords: Christian III King Denmark Dies Frederick II Succeeds
data.meta_description: Biography of Frederick II King Denmark 1534-1588 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
On 29 Oct 1525 [his father] Christian III King Denmark 1503-1559 (age 22) and [his mother] Dorothea of Saxe Lauenburg Queen Consort Denmark and Norway (age 14) were married. He the son of King Frederick I of Denmark (age 54) and Anna of Brandenburg.

On 10 Apr 1533 [his grandfather] King Frederick I of Denmark (age 61) died. His son [his father] Christian III King Denmark 1503-1559 (age 29) succeeded III King Denmark.

On 01 Jul 1534 Frederick II King Denmark was born to Christian III King Denmark 1503-1559 (age 30) and Dorothea of Saxe Lauenburg Queen Consort Denmark and Norway (age 23).

On 01 Jan 1559 [his father] Christian III King Denmark 1503-1559 (age 55) died. His son Frederick II King Denmark (age 24) succeeded II King Denmark.

On 07 Oct 1571 [his mother] Dorothea of Saxe Lauenburg Queen Consort Denmark and Norway (age 60) died.

On 20 Jul 1572 Frederick II King Denmark (age 38) and Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 14) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Denmark. The difference in their ages was 23 years. He the son of Christian III King Denmark 1503-1559 and Dorothea of Saxe Lauenburg Queen Consort Denmark and Norway. They were second cousin once removed.

On 25 Aug 1573 [his daughter] Elizabeth Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 39) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 15).

On 12 Dec 1574 [his daughter] Anne of Denmark Queen Consort Scotland England and Ireland was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 40) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 17).

On 12 Apr 1577 [his son] Christian IV King Denmark 1577-1648 was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 42) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 19).

On 30 Dec 1578 [his son] Prince Ulrik Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 44) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 21).

In 1579 [his son] John August Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 44) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 21).

In 1579 [his son] John August Oldenburg died.

On 05 Apr 1580 [his son] Augusta Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 45) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 22).

On 05 Aug 1581 [his son] Hedwig Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 47) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 23).

On 09 Jul 1583 [his son] John Oldenburg was born to Frederick II King Denmark (age 49) and [his wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 25).

On 04 Apr 1588 Frederick II King Denmark (age 53) died. His son [his son] Christian IV King Denmark 1577-1648 (age 10) succeeded IV King Denmark.

On 14 Oct 1631 [his former wife] Sophie Mecklenburg-Schwerin Queen Consort Denmark (age 74) died.
